text: Kare-ra wa itta. `Shuaibu yo, anata no iu koto o marude rikai dekinai. Mata watashi-tachi wa, hontōni anata wa tayori ni naranai to omou. Anata no dōzoku (no koto) o kangaenakattanaraba, watashi-tachi wa kitto anata o ishi-uchi ni shitadearou. Anata wa watashi-tachi no made wa muryokuna nodearu
